message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and my budget.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your desire to save, however, the value of this product is truly significant. I could consider coming down to $900,000. This is my final offer, as I already have a backup offer close to my minimum.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and my budget. I'm getting close to considering John's offer, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
